newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: CZECH HN-WOOD INDEX FALLS 14 POINTS TO 1,757 PTS.
newsitem.headline: CZECH HN-WOOD INDEX FALLS 14 POINTS TO 1,757 PTS.

text.p: The HN-Wood index, measuring the 60 most capitalised issues on the Prague Stock Exchange, on Tuesday fell 14 points, or 0.79 percent, to 1,757 points, the brokerage house Wood & Company said.
